test.doc: In the previous test case, we verified the BlogPostAPI's specification. In this test case, we query the API for existing postings in the system. If there are pre-existing postings in the system, we check if each posting's fields are matching against the POSTING_SPEC. That is, each pre-set posting has all the fields specified in POSTING_SPEC. If not, the test fails. If success, then we store the pre-set postings into @{PRE_SET_POSTINGS} suite variable for later use

kw.name: Is Match
kw.doc: Note that registered_postings is a list of postings, which are dictionaries. Each posting in registered postings have 'title' & 'content' keys. expected_posting is a dictionary with keys 'title' and 'content' as well. For each posting in registered_postings, we try to find a match its title & its content to that of expected_posting's title & content respectively. If such a match occurs, we return True, otherwise we return false

kw.name: Is Match
kw.doc: Note that registered_postings is a list of postings, which are dictionaries. Each posting in registered postings have 'title' & 'content' keys. expected_posting is a dictionary with keys 'title' and 'content' as well. For each posting in registered_postings, we try to find a match its title & its content to that of expected_posting's title & content respectively. If such a match occurs, we return True, otherwise we return false

test.doc:
In the previous test case, we updated specific posting(s) (i.e. @{expected_modified_postings}) in the system. These postings have been passed as [{'url': 'https://glacial-earth-31542.herokuapp.com/api/postings/195/', 'id': 195, 'user': 1, 'title': 'Posting 1', 'content': 'modified content', 'timestamp': '2020-03-17T15:32:01.446202+02:00'}, {'url': 'https://glacial-earth-31542.herokuapp.com/api/postings/196/', 'id': 196, 'user': 1, 'title': 'Posting 2', 'content': 'modified content', 'timestamp': '2020-03-17T15:32:01.677537+02:00'}, {'url': 'https://glacial-earth-31542.herokuapp.com/api/postings/197/', 'id': 197, 'user': 1, 'title': 'Posting 3', 'content': 'modified content', 'timestamp': '2020-03-17T15:32:01.869724+02:00'}] to this test case.
For each posting to delete (aka. ptd in short) in [{'url': 'https://glacial-earth-31542.herokuapp.com/api/postings/195/', 'id': 195, 'user': 1, 'title': 'Posting 1', 'content': 'modified content', 'timestamp': '2020-03-17T15:32:01.446202+02:00'}, {'url': 'https://glacial-earth-31542.herokuapp.com/api/postings/196/', 'id': 196, 'user': 1, 'title': 'Posting 2', 'content': 'modified content', 'timestamp': '2020-03-17T15:32:01.677537+02:00'}, {'url': 'https://glacial-earth-31542.herokuapp.com/api/postings/197/', 'id': 197, 'user': 1, 'title': 'Posting 3', 'content': 'modified content', 'timestamp': '2020-03-17T15:32:01.869724+02:00'}], We make a DELETE Request for that very ptd. Once all DELETE request(s) are done, a GET request is made into [{'url': 'https://glacial-earth-31542.herokuapp.com/api/postings/1/', 'id': 1, 'user': 1, 'title': 'My First Posting', 'content': "My First Blog's content", 'timestamp': '2019-12-18T17:06:54.373451+02:00'}, {'url': 'https://glacial-earth-31542.herokuapp.com/api/postings/195/', 'id': 195, 'user': 1, 'title': 'Posting 1', 'content': 'modified content', 'timestamp': '2020-03-17T15:32:01.446202+02:00'}, {'url': 'https://glacial-earth-31542.herokuapp.com/api/postings/2/', 'id': 2, 'user': 1, 'title': 'My Second Posting', 'content': "My Second Blog's content (modified)", 'timestamp': '2019-12-18T17:07:34.938150+02:00'}, {'url': 'https://glacial-earth-31542.herokuapp.com/api/postings/196/', 'id': 196, 'user': 1, 'title': 'Posting 2', 'content': 'modified content', 'timestamp': '2020-03-17T15:32:01.677537+02:00'}, {'url': 'https://glacial-earth-31542.herokuapp.com/api/postings/197/', 'id': 197, 'user': 1, 'title': 'Posting 3', 'content': 'modified content', 'timestamp': '2020-03-17T15:32:01.869724+02:00'}]. Then verification begins.
Verification phase one: all the remaining entries in the system are summed up to [{'url': 'https://glacial-earth-31542.herokuapp.com/api/postings/1/', 'id': 1, 'user': 1, 'title': 'My First Posting', 'content': "My First Blog's content", 'timestamp': '2019-12-18T17:06:54.373451+02:00'}, {'url': 'https://glacial-earth-31542.herokuapp.com/api/postings/2/', 'id': 2, 'user': 1, 'title': 'My Second Posting', 'content': "My Second Blog's content (modified)", 'timestamp': '2019-12-18T17:07:34.938150+02:00'}]. (i.e. [{'url': 'https://glacial-earth-31542.herokuapp.com/api/postings/1/', 'id': 1, 'user': 1, 'title': 'My First Posting', 'content': "My First Blog's content", 'timestamp': '2019-12-18T17:06:54.373451+02:00'}, {'url': 'https://glacial-earth-31542.herokuapp.com/api/postings/195/', 'id': 195, 'user': 1, 'title': 'Posting 1', 'content': 'modified content', 'timestamp': '2020-03-17T15:32:01.446202+02:00'}, {'url': 'https://glacial-earth-31542.herokuapp.com/api/postings/2/', 'id': 2, 'user': 1, 'title': 'My Second Posting', 'content': "My Second Blog's content (modified)", 'timestamp': '2019-12-18T17:07:34.938150+02:00'}, {'url': 'https://glacial-earth-31542.herokuapp.com/api/postings/196/', 'id': 196, 'user': 1, 'title': 'Posting 2', 'content': 'modified content', 'timestamp': '2020-03-17T15:32:01.677537+02:00'}, {'url': 'https://glacial-earth-31542.herokuapp.com/api/postings/197/', 'id': 197, 'user': 1, 'title': 'Posting 3', 'content': 'modified content', 'timestamp': '2020-03-17T15:32:01.869724+02:00'}] == [{'url': 'https://glacial-earth-31542.herokuapp.com/api/postings/1/', 'id': 1, 'user': 1, 'title': 'My First Posting', 'content': "My First Blog's content", 'timestamp': '2019-12-18T17:06:54.373451+02:00'}, {'url': 'https://glacial-earth-31542.herokuapp.com/api/postings/2/', 'id': 2, 'user': 1, 'title': 'My Second Posting', 'content': "My Second Blog's content (modified)", 'timestamp': '2019-12-18T17:07:34.938150+02:00'}])
Verification phase two: all the remaining entries in the system are according to {'url': {'type': 'field', 'required': False, 'read_only': True, 'label': 'Url'}, 'id': {'type': 'integer', 'required': False, 'read_only': True, 'label': 'ID'}, 'user': {'type': 'field', 'required': False, 'read_only': True, 'label': 'User'}, 'title': {'type': 'string', 'required': False, 'read_only': False, 'label': 'Title', 'max_length': 120}, 'content': {'type': 'string', 'required': False, 'read_only': False, 'label': 'Content', 'max_length': 120}, 'timestamp': {'type': 'datetime', 'required': False, 'read_only': True, 'label': 'Timestamp'}}
Verification phase three: none of the postings in [{'url': 'https://glacial-earth-31542.herokuapp.com/api/postings/195/', 'id': 195, 'user': 1, 'title': 'Posting 1', 'content': 'modified content', 'timestamp': '2020-03-17T15:32:01.446202+02:00'}, {'url': 'https://glacial-earth-31542.herokuapp.com/api/postings/196/', 'id': 196, 'user': 1, 'title': 'Posting 2', 'content': 'modified content', 'timestamp': '2020-03-17T15:32:01.677537+02:00'}, {'url': 'https://glacial-earth-31542.herokuapp.com/api/postings/197/', 'id': 197, 'user': 1, 'title': 'Posting 3', 'content': 'modified content', 'timestamp': '2020-03-17T15:32:01.869724+02:00'}] can be found in [{'url': 'https://glacial-earth-31542.herokuapp.com/api/postings/1/', 'id': 1, 'user': 1, 'title': 'My First Posting', 'content': "My First Blog's content", 'timestamp': '2019-12-18T17:06:54.373451+02:00'}, {'url': 'https://glacial-earth-31542.herokuapp.com/api/postings/195/', 'id': 195, 'user': 1, 'title': 'Posting 1', 'content': 'modified content', 'timestamp': '2020-03-17T15:32:01.446202+02:00'}, {'url': 'https://glacial-earth-31542.herokuapp.com/api/postings/2/', 'id': 2, 'user': 1, 'title': 'My Second Posting', 'content': "My Second Blog's content (modified)", 'timestamp': '2019-12-18T17:07:34.938150+02:00'}, {'url': 'https://glacial-earth-31542.herokuapp.com/api/postings/196/', 'id': 196, 'user': 1, 'title': 'Posting 2', 'content': 'modified content', 'timestamp': '2020-03-17T15:32:01.677537+02:00'}, {'url': 'https://glacial-earth-31542.herokuapp.com/api/postings/197/', 'id': 197, 'user': 1, 'title': 'Posting 3', 'content': 'modified content', 'timestamp': '2020-03-17T15:32:01.869724+02:00'}]

kw.name: Delete All Sessions
kw.doc: Removes all the session objects

suite.doc: This test suite uses robotframework-request library to test BlogPostAPI Note that the API supports only: 'GET, POST, HEAD, OPTIONS' methods on URL: https://glacial-earth-31542.herokuapp.com/api/postings/ If you want to update/delete a posting, then you need to use its url. For example: https://glacial-earth-31542.herokuapp.com/api/postings/26/
